content: कंप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (कंपते चकंपे, कंपित) To shake, tremble, move about; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); चकंपे तीर्णलौहित्ये तस्मिन् प्राग्ज्योतिषेश्वरः <ls>R. 4. 81</ls>; <ls>Mk. 4. 8</ls>; <ls>Bk. 14. 31</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 70.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To shake, cause to tremble. {@--2@} To utter with a thrill or shake.
